data.name: FormulaProperties
desc: The formula properties provide access to the properties of a formula in a formula generator.
**since**
OOo 3.4

properties.name: Alignment
desc: contains the alignment of the formula.

properties.name: BaseFontHeight
desc: contains the base font height in point the formula will be formatted in.
All properties containing relative values are related to this value.

properties.name: BaseLine
desc: contains the baselines offset in respect to the top of the formula rectangle
**since**
OOo 3.4

properties.name: BottomMargin
desc: contains the metric value of the bottom margin of the formula.

properties.name: CustomFontNameFixed
desc: customized name for fixed font.

properties.name: CustomFontNameSans
desc: customized name for sans serif font

properties.name: CustomFontNameSerif
desc: customized name for serif font

properties.name: FontFixedIsBold
desc: determines if the customized fixed font is bold.

properties.name: FontFixedIsItalic
desc: determines if the customized fixed font is italic.

properties.name: FontFunctionsIsBold
desc: determines if the font that is used to display functions is bold.

properties.name: FontFunctionsIsItalic
desc: determines if the font that is used to display functions is italic.

properties.name: FontNameFunctions
desc: contains the name of the font that is used to display functions contained in the formula.

properties.name: FontNameNumbers
desc: contains the name of the font that is used to display numbers contained in the formula.

properties.name: FontNameText
desc: contains the name of the font that is used to display text contained in the formula.

properties.name: FontNameVariables
desc: contains the name of the font that is used to display variables contained in the formula.

properties.name: FontNumbersIsBold
desc: determines if the font that is used to display numbers is bold.

properties.name: FontNumbersIsItalic
desc: determines if the font that is used to display numbers is italic.

properties.name: FontSansIsBold
desc: determines if the customized sans serif font is bold.

properties.name: FontSansIsItalic
desc: determines if the customized sans serif font is italic.

properties.name: FontSerifIsBold
desc: determines if the customized serif font is bold.

properties.name: FontSerifIsItalic
desc: determines if the customized serif font is italic.

properties.name: FontTextIsBold
desc: determines if the font that is used to display text is bold.

properties.name: FontTextIsItalic
desc: determines if the font that is used to display text is italic.

properties.name: FontVariablesIsBold
desc: determines if the font that is used to display variables is bold.

properties.name: FontVariablesIsItalic
desc: determines if the font that is used to display variables is italic.

properties.name: Formula
desc: contains the command string of the formula

properties.name: IsScaleAllBrackets
desc: decides if all brackets (even those without \"left\"/\"right\" modifier) are scaled.

properties.name: IsTextMode
desc: switches into text mode.
This is a mode where formulas are displayed the same height as a line of text.

properties.name: LeftMargin
desc: contains the metric value of the left margin of the formula.

properties.name: RelativeBracketDistance
desc: contains the relative distance of brackets.

properties.name: RelativeBracketExcessSize
desc: contains the relative excess size of brackets.

properties.name: RelativeFontHeightFunctions
desc: contains the relative height of the font for functions.
The values unit is percent of the com.sun.star.formula.FormulaProperties.BaseFontHeight

properties.name: RelativeFontHeightIndices
desc: contains the relative height of the font for indices.
The values unit is percent of the com.sun.star.formula.FormulaProperties.BaseFontHeight

properties.name: RelativeFontHeightLimits
desc: contains the relative height of the font for limits.
The values unit is percent of the com.sun.star.formula.FormulaProperties.BaseFontHeight

properties.name: RelativeFontHeightOperators
desc: contains the relative height of the font for operators.
The values unit is percent of the com.sun.star.formula.FormulaProperties.BaseFontHeight

properties.name: RelativeFontHeightText
desc: contains the relative height of the font for text.
The values unit is percent of the com.sun.star.formula.FormulaProperties.BaseFontHeight

properties.name: RelativeFractionBarExcessLength
desc: contains the relative excess length of a fraction bar.

properties.name: RelativeFractionBarLineWeight
desc: contains the relative line weight of a fraction bar.

properties.name: RelativeFractionDenominatorDepth
desc: contains the relative depth of the denominator of a fraction

properties.name: RelativeFractionNumeratorHeight
desc: contains the relative height of the numerator of a fraction.

properties.name: RelativeIndexSubscript
desc: contains the relative superscript of indices.

properties.name: RelativeIndexSuperscript
desc: contains the relative subscript of indices.

properties.name: RelativeLineSpacing
desc: contains the relative line spacing.

properties.name: RelativeLowerLimitDistance
desc: contains the relative distance of lower limits.

properties.name: RelativeMatrixColumnSpacing
desc: contains the relative column spacing of matrices.

properties.name: RelativeMatrixLineSpacing
desc: contains the relative line spacing of matrices.

properties.name: RelativeOperatorExcessSize
desc: contains the relative excess of operators.

properties.name: RelativeOperatorSpacing
desc: contains the relative spacing of operators.

properties.name: RelativeRootSpacing
desc: contains the relative root spacing

properties.name: RelativeScaleBracketExcessSize
desc: contains the relative scaling of the bracket excess.

properties.name: RelativeSpacing
desc: contains the relative spacing.

properties.name: RelativeSymbolMinimumHeight
desc: contains the relative minimum height of the formula.

properties.name: RelativeSymbolPrimaryHeight
desc: contains the relative primary height of symbols.

properties.name: RelativeUpperLimitDistance
desc: contains the relative distance of upper limits

properties.name: RightMargin
desc: contains the metric value of the right margin of the formula.

properties.name: TopMargin
desc: contains the metric value of the top margin of the formula.
